issuerLockTokenResponse.title: LockTokenResponse response with hash of lock

proof_elapsed.title: proof_elapsed — PKT block hash confirming expiration lock

lock.title: lock_id — hash with information about lock justification

justificationsTranferToken.title: TranferToken receiving funds for tokens and unlcok them

recipient.title: recipient — wallet addres of new owner of tokens

sender.title: sender — owner of the wallet address to which tokens will be returned

proof_count.title: proof_count — lock expiration time in PKT blocks

creation_height.title: creation_height — creation height in token blockchain

signature.title: signature generated with old owner private key

lockLock.title: Lock contain information about tokens and contract for transferring

tokens.title:
/ Caleb: We need to be careful to identify a token by it's ID 
(hash of block 1). This ID cannot be stored inside of the Token object 
because it will change the hash of the Token object which will then 
change the hash of the State object, which will then change the hash of
block 1, which changes the ID. It is important to use the ID to identify
 a token because this contains the initial token holders. IMO this 
should be `repeated string token_ids = 1;`

total.title:
total number of registered tokens, if the issued_id is passed, only
its tokens are taken into account

replicatorGetTokenListResponse.title: GetTokenListResponse — list of tokens with additional info

limit.title: limit – maximum on the one page

offset.title: offset from the beginning of the list

replicatorPagination.title: Pagination used for separation on page

root.title: root — hash of last block in blockchain

replicatorToken.title: Token contain information about token to send it and store in DB

justifications.description:
justifications — collection of one of justification structure with 
payload information.

creation.title: creation — date of block creation in unix time format

state.title:
state — hash of state structure containing locks, owners and meta token 
info

pkt_block_hash.title: pkt_block_hash —  the hash of the most recent PKT block

pkt_block_height.title: pkt_block_height — the height of the most recent PKT block

height.title: height — the current height of this TokenStrike chain

signature.title:
signature — issuer ID, needed for validate. If signature incorrect block
is not valid

tokendbBlock.title: Block is struct of block in blockchain

lock_over.title: lock_over — payload with lock time over

genesis.title: genesis — justification to initialize block chian

tokendbJustification.title: Justification is a helper to use it in block

holder_wallet.title: holder_wallet — hash of wallet address of holder

count.title: count — number of tokens held on wallet

tokendbOwner.title: Owner contains information about the holders' wallets and their balances

expiration.title: expiration — number of PKT block after which the token expires

creation.title: creation — date of token creation in unix time format

issuer_pubkey.title: issuer_pubkey — public key of issuer used for signing

urls.title: urls — set of urls for access to blockchain
